name: AI Context Flow
tagline: Reusable AI Memory for Smarter Prompts Anywhere
description: Stop explaining yourself to every AI like it's the first day of school. Over 1 billion users repeat the same context everywhere. AI Context Flow lets you save it once, and use it anywhere: ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and more. Smarter chats, zero repetition. Finally.

name: Shadcnblocks
tagline: The ultimate block set for shadcn/ui, Tailwind, and React
description: Explore a premium collection of uniquely crafted blocks and components, custom-built for shadcn/ui, Tailwind, and React. Designed, developed and reviewed by our team, these high-quality, interactive, and fully responsive components are ready to copy and paste seamlessly into your project or install via the shadcn CLI.

name: GTA Radio
tagline: Listen to GTA V radio stations in your browser anytime
description: Stream all your favorite GTA V radio stations in your browser. Interactive radio wheel interface with 17 stations. Works on desktop and mobile as a PWA.

name: Gempod
tagline: A treasure chest for your bookmarks
description: Save, organize, and find your bookmarks with AI-powered tagging. Private, secure, and free. Available for iPhone, iPad, and Mac with on-device AI.

name: StoryMotion
tagline: Engaging Animated Diagrams, Flowcharts Made Easy
description: Create animated diagrams and flowcharts with hand-drawn style. Export as videos for presentations, courses, and social media

name: Turbo AI
tagline: Turn anything into notes, flashcards, quizzes, and more!
description: Turbo AI, also known as Turbolearn AI, is a note taking and study platform with over 5 million users. It generates notes, flashcards, quizzes, and podcasts from any audio, PDFs, and YouTube videos. Try it yourself at www.turbo.ai.

name: Compyle
tagline: The coding agent that asks before it builds
description: Stop wasting time debugging autonomous agents that built the wrong thing. Compyle keeps you in the driver's seat - asking smart questions to understand requirements, creating planning artifacts before coding, and checking in when decisions need to be made. Now with GLM 4.6, Claude Sonnet 4.5, and Claude Haiku 4.5 support. Get 20% off all plans today with code PH20!

name: Jolt
tagline: Track your writing like you track your runs on Strava
description: Jolt is a new tool for writers to track their flow, focus, and momentum. Combining real-time analytics and motivation, Jolt helps writers show up consistently and bring their stories to life--all without AI writing or suggestions.

name: FocusDrive
tagline: Simulate car journeys for deep focus sessions
description: Plan a route, start a drive, and stay focused with simulated car journeys.

name: OneSnap!
tagline: Link your phones, snap better pictures together
description: Not getting the shot right? With OneSnap!, you can preview your friend‚Äôs camera view in real time and guide the pose and framing. Capture the moment‚Äîperfectly, together. OneSnap! recreates the ‚Äúremote preview + shutter‚Äù experience from Apple Watch, but extends it to two phones: You see the frame here. They shoot over there. Clear communication, better photos, together.

name: YouTube Downloader Free
tagline: Download videos from youtube for free - no signups or ads
description: YouTube downloader that actually works. No ads, sign-ups, software installs, or wait times. Other "free" tools waste your time with endless hoops when you just need to download a video. This one is different: paste link, get download. Built because simple tasks should be simple.

name: Tianfu Agent
tagline: Chinese Zi Wei Dou Shu (Á¥´ÂæÆÊñóÊï∞) futuretelling Agent.
description: Tianfu Agent learns the master‚Äôs deduction process‚Äîfrom birth data to chart creation, interpretation, and iterative refinement‚Äîenabling AI to decode your destiny chart with master-level insight. Tianfu Agent is equipped with: - A customizable chart operation suite with visualized analysis steps. - Professional Qintian(Èí¶Â§©) Ziwei Doushu. - An uncertainty-based combined destiny analysis model (Ba Zi & Zi Wei). - A long-term personalized memory system.

name: AppConnectr
tagline: For Apple Devs - App Store Connect on Android
description: AppConnectr brings Apple‚Äôs App Store Connect experience to Android. üéâ Perfect for developers who use Android but still need to monitor their iOS or macOS apps. Check app details, track TestFlight builds, view earnings, and reply to reviews, all from your Android phone. No more switching devices just to stay updated. Manage your App Store presence seamlessly, wherever you are.

name: Oglama‚Ñ¢
tagline: Private web automation
description: Oglama is an LLM-enabled desktop application that allows you to automate web actions. ‚úÖ Anonymous - it runs entirely on your PC, with local logs ‚úÖ Private - your credentials, tokens and logins never leave your computer ‚úÖ Predictable - no usage based pricing, no locked features ‚úÖ Transparent - every module comes with fully editable source code ‚úÖ Deterministic - the embedded LLM is only used for tasks beyond traditional programming; everything else is pure JavaScript ‚úÖ Overkill for UI testing

name: Interiorly
tagline: Furnish your room with AI using real shoppable furniture
description: Upload a photo, choose your vibe, and Interiorly delivers a shoppable 4K makeover with every product ready to order.

name: Mono Card
tagline: Create beautiful visual cards for your social content
description: Create beautiful visual cards for your social media posts. Share music, podcasts, articles, videos, or text as stunning visuals. Add mockups, phone bezels to recordings, customize with stickers and backgrounds. 100% free, made with love for beautiful content.

name: Vetr.is Cloud Platform
tagline: High-performance VMs hosted in Iceland's green data centers.
description: Privacy-first cloud hosting in Iceland powered by 100% renewable energy. Experience secure, high-performance VPS with NVMe storage and AMD Ryzen CPUs.

name: 2ndPilot
tagline: Predict founder conflicts. Build aligned & resilient teams.
description: 2ndPilot helps founders, teams, and VCs predict team risks before they lead to conflict, burnout, or failure. Assess cofounder fit, simulate crisis scenarios, and optimize roles ‚Äî all in one AI-powered behavioral intelligence platform that builds aligned, resilient teams.

name: Audixa AI
tagline: Premium voices. Sensible pricing.
description: Audixa AI is a high-fidelity text-to-speech API for developers & creators who want ElevenLabs-level quality without the cost. Great voices are expensive, affordable ones sound robotic-so we built Audixa. Fast, realistic voices. Reliable API. Simple docs. Up to 10x cheaper, with a real free tier. Perfect for AI apps, agents, voice tools & content automation.

name: Codefast
tagline: Everything your SaaS needs. Ready out of the box.
description: CodeFast is a production-ready SaaS boilerplate built with Next.js and Express. It includes authentication, payments, database setup, and a landing page ‚Äî everything you need to launch fast. Focus on your core product while we handle the setup, structure, and best practices so you can go from idea to launch in days.
